body:
Last I remember, running `spack extensions python` printed a list of installed Python extensions and a list of activated Python extensions. Now it simply prints:
```
$ spack extensions python
==> python@2.7.13%clang@8.0.0-apple~tk~ucs4 arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 -ckrr4mg has no extensions.
```
title: spack extensions broken
